main.first: Hello! My name is Alexey Loktev. I am {{age}} years old and work as a frontend developer.
main.second: I completed my secondary education at the school affiliated with the Embassy of the Russian Federation in Madrid, Spain. After successfully passing my exams, I joined the Russian military. Following my military service, I enrolled in the Higher School of Economics in Nizhny Novgorod, specializing in innovation management. After graduating from university, I had the opportunity to work in various fields, ranging from banking to customs. However, after the events of 2022, I lost my job and decided to dedicate my free time to learning frontend development. I have a family, including a little daughter and an even smaller French Bulldog. I enjoy playing the guitar, have a strong passion for basketball, and find everything related to construction fascinating. Most importantly, after working in an IT company, I have no interest in pursuing a career in other fields. Therefore, I have made the decision to stay committed to the path of a frontend developer, continually improving my skills and becoming a professional in this field.
